run module¶

Main run script to start server and load data in ES

run.create_arg_parser()[source]¶

Creates argument parser

Returns:
argparse.ArgumentParser: Parser to fetch arguments from terminal
run.es_load()[source]¶

Loads ES with tweets

Fetches data from twitter stream and indexes parsed data in ES index

run.init()[source]¶

Loads ES with tweets and starts server

Loads ES with the fetched tweet stream, and start the flask application server

run.start_server()[source]¶

Start the server

Starts the Flask application server on localhost, port 8080
